pages.title: Magmatic Set
pages.text: The Magmatic Turtlemancer armor set is one of the most resistant armor, enduring the biggest hits won't be a problem. $(br2)If you have equipped the whole set, you will lose a bit of your maximum health, but you will set whoever attacks you on fire (even if it was a distance attack!).

pages.title: Magmatic Chestplate
pages.text: This will probably last a couple of hits at least. Go fight a dragon or something to test it. Come on, don't be a $(thing)chicken$().

pages.title: Magmatic Leggings
pages.text: Remember to wear some leggings. Maybe not this ones if you don't want to, but definitely wear some leggings.

pages.title: Magmatic Boots
pages.text: Does it come in pink? No, sorry, there is no pink in hell.
